"A.D.2028/4/22/10:00": "Mother, where are you? Hm?"
"So they're started spawning here as well..."
"No, I suppose you could say they've spawned here because they are Phantoms."
"After all, this place is part of Mother... You could even call this location the birthplace of Ether!"
"Tch, there are a lot of them. Even though I have no time to waste..."
"Mother... what was that?"
"If they aren't used to me, and refuse to obey me, I'll just absorb them. Absorb them and force them to obey. What of it?"
"Even the more powerful ones? Can your body handle that?"
"You needn't worry. More importantly, I believe you needed me?"
"Yes, I have a report. However, it's likely not something you want to hear."
"Kohri Washinomiya appears to have returned to her senses. She has left our side."
"In addition, Ophiel still hasn't returned. Either he chose to abandon us or..."
"...perhaps now, we're the only two left."
"...I see."
"Aratron. You should leave as well. You have no reason to stay here any longer."
"Hoho. Don't worry, Mother. I will remain by your side. I won't leave you alone. I promised you, after all."
"Being together like this brings back memories. When we first met. That day I came to investigate the moon."
"That day, you showed me new possibilites, and I chose to follow you. Nothing has changed. Old men like me don't often change their minds."
"You were the one who showed this old man wonderous possibilities. Whatever happens, that will never change, Mother."
"Even if I end up doing something \"wrong\"?"
"Hoho. I was the one who woke you up. You, who slept on the moon 12 years ago, when I was involved in development here."
"Because of this, I have an obligation to see what happens with my own eyes."
"That's my responsibility. What you seek to accomplish, whatever it may be, good or bad, I'll be here."
"History is written by the victors, and will show what is \"right\"."
"We can only act in accordance with our desires. My desire is to watch over your story. That's all."
"With your heart, with your mind... Mother, accomplish what you must. I will use my power for that purpose."
"...You're whymsical as always."

"ほほ。
わしにとってそれは、褒め言葉よ。"

"……事態は、最終局面。
ここからは、一手も間違えられない。"

"人類の進化と、発展……
そして新たなる創造のために……
……僕も、動かなければいけないね。"
